    • Method Detail

      • generateWorldState

        java.util.HashSet<javaGOAP.GoapState> generateWorldState()
        Returns:
        a Object which represents the current WorldState.

      • generateGoalState

        java.util.List<javaGOAP.GoapState> generateGoalState()
        Returns:
        a Object which represents the current GoalState.

      • generateAvailableActions

        java.util.LinkedHashSet<javaGOAP.GoapAction> generateAvailableActions()
        Returns:
        a Object which represents the currently available Actions.
        Note:
        The return type is a LinkedHashSet due to the order of upgrades and technologies being important. This is the main difference in comparison with the StateFactory class.

      • getMatchingWorldStateUpdater

        Updater getMatchingWorldStateUpdater(BuildActionManager manager)
        Parameters:
        manager - the BuildActionManager which the factory is being assigned to.
        Returns:
        a Updater matching the used WorldState.

      • getMatchingGoalStateUpdater

      • getMatchingActionUpdater

        Updater getMatchingActionUpdater(BuildActionManager manager)
        Parameters:
        manager - the BuildActionManager which the factory is being assigned to.
        Returns:
        a Updater matching the assigned Actions.
